page.title: 16Pitreavie Castle (2)
page.content: Pitreavie Castle Base, which is the home of the Joint Maritime Hedquarters in the north, is used for defence and rescuing. The castle itself is on Bikini estate. This is also where the main base is The base is at least ten metres underground. One of the main rooms, contains a row of teleprinters, and an impressive amount of electronic equipment. With this equipment, they can communicate with airfields, helicopters and aeroplanes to ask them to help with rescue and defence activities. However,this base is only used when the base at Northwood isn't working. There is also a room which displays the positions of all the N.A.T.O. and Soviet ships and submarines. We were lucky enough to visit the Pitreavie Castle. P. Steele.
